attributes.action: Create standard mark for GCSE grade 4
attributes.additional_details: The current system unjustly ensures some students can never pass regardless of national outcomes. This limits a large proportion of students from achieving A-levels, even if they have the capability to be on these courses. This system limits capabilities and opportunities of young people, education in the twenty-first century should promote students' futures rather than limiting opportunities.
attributes.background: Create a specific mark to award GCSE grade 4 to give all students opportunity to achieve a pass.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about grading for exams are a matter for exam boards, individual schools and Ofqual.
